description:
Redtail Paddles, based in Ontario, is famous as a quality paddle maker. This ottertail paddle is shaped for deep-water recreational use. It’s made from exotic black walnut, famous for its dark chocolate brown colour and eye-catching grain. Black walnut boasts the strength of other hardwoods and is extremely lightweight.

  • Features Redtail’s Ergo grip, which feels very natural in the hands
name: Redtail Ottertail Black Walnut Canoe Paddle
